content:
Hi there.
I raised this issue already in #shorthand, but was directed to this stream.
I created Logical Models and added Mappings to existing resources or other logical models within the IG. When I render them with the IG Publisher, the (non-existant!) mappings to v3 contain a link in the heading, but the mappings to standard resources and to my other logical models don't. I already tried:

  • writing the canonicalURL there
  • writing html there.
    None of them worked. Is there a way to do so?
    Thanks in advance!

This is my Mapping:
image.png
and this is the output:
image.png

As QuestionnaireResponse is a standard resource, I would like to link to the standard resource.
